epyr.sub.loadESP

Functions

load(full_base_name, file_extension, scaling)

Loads Bruker ESP/WinEPR data (.spc, .par).
epyr.sub.loadESP.load(full_base_name: Path, file_extension: str, scaling: str) → tuple[source]

Loads Bruker ESP/WinEPR data (.spc, .par).

Parameters:

  • full_base_name – Path object without extension.

  • file_extension – The original file extension (e.g., ‘.spc’, ‘.par’).

  • scaling – Scaling string (e.g., ‘nP G’).

Returns:

(data, abscissa, parameters)

Return type:

tuple
